snippet: President Obama on Monday bestowed the nation’s highest military honor on Clinton Romesha for defending a remote American outpost in Afghanistan from a Taliban attack in 2009.
abstract: Pres Obama bestows Medal of Honor, nation's highest military honor, on retired Army staff sergeant Clinton Romesha, who defended remote American outpost in Afghanistan from Taliban attack of more than 300 fighters in 2009.
lead_paragraph: President Obama on Monday bestowed the nation’s highest military honor on Clinton Romesha for defending a remote American outpost in Afghanistan from a Taliban attack in 2009.

headline.seo: Obama Awards Medal of Honor to Clinton Romesha
headline.main: Obama Awards Medal of Honor to Former Army Sergeant
headline.print_headline: Obama Awards Medal of Honor to Former Army Sergeant
